title.rendered: How to search for rooms that allow couples

content.rendered:
To filter rooms that allow couples, follow these steps:

Web

  • Login to your Roomi account from our homepage
  • Click Browse Listings from the menu in the top left corner
  • Click More Filters under the search bar
  • Click Couples OK under the House Rules filters
  • Click Apply Filters

iOS

  • Tap Browse in the bottom left corner of the dashboard
  • Tap the filter icon in the top right hand corner of the screen
  • Scroll down to Rules and tap Show More to expand the search filters
  • Tap Couples OK and then scroll back up and tap Apply

Android

  • Tap the menu icon (the icon represents three small bars stacked vertically) from the top left-hand corner to bring out the slide-out menu
  • Tap Browse Listings
  • Tap the filter icon in the bottom right corner and select Couples OK from the Rules section.
  • Tap Apply at the top of the screen

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I deactivate my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Deactivating your listing will take it out of the search results while giving you the option to re-activate it at a later time. As soon as the listing is deactivated you will need a listing credit in order to reactivate it. When you reactivate your listing you will need to…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I create a listing on Roomi?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I boost my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We offer the option to boost your listing if you need to fill your room quickly.
